short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically download media files (images) from Telegram chats and groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically download all media files from a specific Telegram chat or group or channel

You can follow 3 steps to download photos, videos or other media files from a specific chat or group or channel:

1. Open Telegram Web
Navigate to Telegram Web (web.telegram.org) and log in to your account. 

2. Select the chat or group or channel
Once logged in, select the chat from which you want to download images. Scroll up chats to select the oldest image/photo/video.

3. Download all media files
Open Telegram Media Downloader extension and click on DOWNLOAD button.
